welcome_message_body: Welcome to El Bosque, Chile! Enjoy the charming atmosphere of our city, known for its beautiful parks and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that El Bosque has to offer.

restaurants.name: Di Casa Pizza
restaurants.description: Di Casa Pizza is a pizzeria located in El Bosque.
restaurants.address: El Bosque, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Rosita Ríos
restaurants.description: Rosita Ríos is a restaurant located in El Bosque.
restaurants.address: Lo Moreno 923, El Bosque, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: El Tio
restaurants.description: El Tio is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pasteleria El Parron
restaurants.description: Pasteleria El Parron is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.name: Li Ko Fu
restaurants.description: Li Ko Fu is a asian restaurant located in Santiago de Chile.
restaurants.address: Santa Marta 14147, Santiago de Chile, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at the airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
